Comments_List: I learned how to formally write a reduction, define and prove security properties, and write a short academic paper in cryptography.

Symmetry key encryption and public key encryption.
Digital signature.
Multi-party computation.
Some other advanced cryptography techniques.
I liked that the course included both proofs and coding, as both are important to the study of computer security.
Yes, it is a very interesting subject!
